Keywords: Agents of Atlas , Avengers , Champions , Fantastic Four , Illuminati , Monster , S.H.I.E.L.D. , Scientist
Real Name: Amadeus Cho
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Ignores Hindering, Ignores Blocking and destroys blocking terrain as the character moves through it
FOUR S.H.I.E.L.D. BEAST HUNTERS: When Hulk is given a MOVE action, after resolutions remove an action token from him and he can use Stealth until your next turn.
THE TOTALLY AWESOME HULK: Leap/Climb, Super Strength
NINTH SMARTEST NOW: Outwit, but Hulk may use it X times per turn, where X is 1 plus the number of opposing characters he's damaged this turn.

August 19, 2020
jtallday
I mean he isn't really typical meta but most of those keywords can totally use a 40 point piece that can destroy up to 10 squares of blocking per turn EVERY turn for almost free or Charge and Quake to gain numerous Outwits at once? Indom and all 3 clix are solid. Some cheap TK leaves you the remaining 200+ points to crack off. Give him a chance. He may surprise you.

Though it's hard not to see better tactical uses for forty points on most of the keywords here, I do appreciate a team-friendly point cost for Amadeus.
